Create and start your own story anyway you would like. A story that changes events from the movies or a different storyline.

1115.content:
Create an original character and introduce them to the Marvel Cinematic Universe, they can be a superhero, a supervillain or just an ordinary citizen who stumbles onto a hero.

You could have something happen to them that doesn't tie into any heroes.

A character with abilities, a character who finds a tiny hero, a character who grows, someone who travels into space.

The choice is up to you.

Charlie wakes up in the middle of the night
11151.content:
Charlie sighs as he crawls into a little cardboard box that is resting near a playground, its currently raining but Charlie has turned this cardboard box into his home. It wasn't the best thing in the world but he did enjoy it, it was made even better due to him being able to change sizes. He prefers sticking to five inches tall as it made the cardboard box feel like a mansion to him and finding food so much better as half a cookie is a large amount at five inches.

Charlie White is seventeen years old with short black hair and born with inhuman genes. Charlie has had a rough couple of months. It all started around his seventeenth birthday. His family was getting ready to celebrate his birthday but his older brother didn't make things easy on him. He was always picked on by him causing him to feel insecure about himself and super shy.

On his seventeenth birthday He had friends over as well as extended family there to celebrate. While he was open with people and did talk to people quiet well he always felt the need to retreat to a safe spot whenever he felt uncomfortable or embarrassed. He had a decent amount of friends but did suffer a bit from anxiety and having the occasional panic attacks.

Right when his mother brought the cake out and everyone sung happy birthday his older brother made a snarky and mean quote towards Charlie that caused a few people to laugh, some out of nervous and others were genuine. Charlie felt super embarrassed and felt his anxiety slowly rise. He thought he was about to have a panic attack but instead something else happened to him. He started to shrink right before everyone. Everyone freaked out and screamed bloody Mary. Charlie was unsure what to do as he was panicking just as much as everyone else. Everyone got up and left faster than a rocket but he managed to grow back in the end.

His parents weren't too happy. His mother broke down in tears and his father was yelling and screaming. He tried to explain that he didn't mean to do this but they didn't care. Before he knew it he was tossed out of the house with no where to go. He tried to crash at a friends place but they rejected him. No one would take him in, after what he's seen on TV and the news about Inhumans and people abilities who weren't Avengers, who would?

Charlie found a small cardboard box beside a playground, he moves it inside a bush out of sight and shrunk to five inches tall crawling inside.

That was a couple of months ago, ever since that day he has remained five inches tall and would occasionally grow at nights when no one is around to try to control and understand his powers. Because he was living close to a playground he would sneak out at night and pick up some lost toys for his new home making it look more like a home. He would bathe in the fountain down the road and pick up some doll clothes to wear.

He had no idea what he wanted to do in the future or how to get there, his trauma has got him down quite a bit as he feels he'll never get anywhere in life due to the person he is now.

Charlie climbs into his custom made bed pulling the sheets up to his neck snuggling in. He sighs and just lays there listening to the rain fall, hitting the leaves of the bush above and land on the roof of his home. Luckily he had put a bit of plastic on the roof to stop it getting wet.

"I guess my life can't get any worse." Charlie sighs.

Charlie rolls on his side and drifts off to sleep.
11151.title: Charlie White

1133.content:
(In this alternate reality, Grawp is actually quite handsome)

In another reality, some would accuse Hermione of having a type. She was quite fond of all her fellow Gryffindors, of course, and had even thought about having a crush on her friend Harry. She did find a number of his personality traits very attractive and endearing. But the first member of the opposite sex who had gotten Hermione's blood racing was Viktor Krum.

Not that anything ever happened between Viktor and Hermione. Viktor was too overwhelmed by Hermione's intellect to give her more than a chaste kiss. And Hermione wasn't attracted to Viktor's personality. But she could not deny she was drawn to his sheer physicality.

So Hermione felt a certain amount of relief when Viktor left Hogwarts, and she could fully focus her intellect again.

Recently Hermione had been flirting with the idea of having Ron as a boyfriend. He did have some redeeming qualities, and her conscious mind had almost convinced herself that Ron was the one she was supposed to be with. Her subconscious mind, however, thought the idea was ridiculous, and felt Hermione was only focusing on Ron because of her long friendship with him and Harry, and Harry dating Ron's sister.

In another reality, Hermione might have indeed married Ron, if she hadn't met Hagrid's brother Grawp.

Grawp was a giant to be sure, looking to be eighteen feet tall. But he didn't look to be a typical giant.

For one thing, both Grawp himself, as well the fur loincloth and vest he wore were quite clean. Giants as a rule weren't the fastidious sort. And although giants were, well, gigantic, none would ever be mistaken for fitness models. But Grawp was quite buff.

Then there was the lack of facial hair. You couldn't believe he was Hagrid's half brother. Of course, Grawp was quite a deal younger than Hagrid, looking to be the same age, or perhaps slightly older, than Ron, Harry and Hermione.

And there was Grawp's face. It wasn't a bad looking face. It was actually quite handsome, with its guileless blue eyes and topped with a mop of unkempt sandy blonde hair.

Perhaps it was the combination of all this that caught Hermione off guard. That and the fact that, for his size, Grawp could move quite fast. Whatever it was, when the trio of young magic users back away from Grawp, Hermione stumbled, allowing Grawp to easily grab her om his hand.

Hermione immediately noticed both the strength of Grawp's grasp and its gentleness. She noticed that his breath was actually quite pleasant, smelling of spearmint and wildflowers. And she noticed two of Grawp's fingers were planted firmly on her posterior.

It took a few seconds for Hermione to collect her thoughts as Hagrid chided his brother about what he did. Once Hermione got a hold of herself, though, she quite firmly told Grawp to set her down.

She was almost disappointed when the young giant obeyed her.

Ron blustered at Grawp, telling the giant to keep his distance from Hermione. Hermione could tell that Ron was obviously feeling emasculated. Grawp didn't take any notice of Ron, instead turning to his collection of objects he had gathered over the years.

Grawp turned back around, holding the handlebar of a bicycle in his hand. Hermione noticed that that handlebar had been polished to a bright sheen, with a chain of wildflowers woven around each of the ends.

Hermione deduced that not only was Grawp quicker than one might suspect, but those giant fingers of his were far more nimble than they might seem.

Grawp pressed the little bell on the handlebar, making it ring, then leaned down to hand the handlebar to Hermione. Hermione gingerly accepted the gift, then made the bell ring. Grawp was obviously delighted as he sat down, the look on his face one of perfect contentment.

When Hagrid said Grawp could look after himself, and only needed company, the three young Gryffindors happily agreed to look in on him. Especially Hermione.

-------------------------------

The next day was Saturday, and even though most Hogwarts' students would be enjoying their morning free time, Hermione would usually be buried in one of her independent studies. This Saturday, though, she got up earlier than usual (after a fairly restless night) and, not quite understanding why, entered the forest to seek out Grawp. When she got to the tree where he had been tied up, she found the rope loosened and Grawp gone. Well, that made sense, she reasoned. Hagrid did say Grawp took care of himself. Obviously Grawp had been tied up for the benefit of meeting his three new friends.

Hermione searched around and soon found Grawp

115131.content:
It was a difficult life for Anna and Elsa. The two of them were princesses of Arrendelle. Their mother and father were the King and Queen and they loved them very much.

There was a few things different about Elsa and Anna, yes they loved each other and played around like most kids, but to the surprise of everyone in the Kingdom, the two sisters were born only five inches tall. This perplexed the Kingdom's doctors but Anna and Elsa's parents loved them no matter how tiny they were.

If that wasn't crazy enough. One day the King and Queen saw that there was snow in the dollhouse where their daughters lived. They looked in and they saw them playing in the snow, with Elsa creating ice and snow from out of thin air!

"Mother! Father! Look at what I can do?" the tiny girl said.

The parents were amazed at Elsa's gifts but they also worried about her potentially causing any danger. They tried to keep Elsa's powers a secret, and to protect the tiny Anna, they mostly kept them separate. Elsa would sleep on a small bed on her parents bed side table while Anna slept in the dollhouse in her old room.

Years later. The two girls grew up into beautiful and intelligent young women. The King and Queen knew that the time would eventually come where Elsa (despite being a few inches tall) would ascend to be Queen and she had to be ready for it.

One day Anna and Elsa were sitting around on the arm chair of the palace throne.

"I can't believe you're gonna be Queen soon." Anna said.

"Yeah, I just wish there wasn't so much pressure." Elsa responded.

"Aw, don't worry about it, sis. You've got me to be there for you when you mess up." Anna hugged Elsa and kissed her on the cheek.

"You're the best, "little sis". Elsa joked.

"Hey, we're both only six inches tall. You're not that much bigger than me." Anna laughed.

"Yes but I am your big sister still."

The two sisters hugged and laughed. Despite their limited interaction, Elsa and Anna still loved each other and were as close as two doll sized sisters could be. But even though they had a sisterly bond, there was something else that the two tiny royal girls felt for each other but they couldn't explain it yet.

So what happens now with our tiny princesses?

115211.content:
It was destined to be an unusual day for all.

It started with Abu stealing a cheap ring from one of the carts in the bazaar. At least, the original owner of the ring thought it was a cheap ring. When the ring ended up missing, the cart owner consoled himself that he was only missing the cheapest ring in his possession.

Abu was a little disappointed with the ring as well. The little monkey thought he had snagged one of the better rings with his tail.

When the monkey gave the ring to Aladdin, his human friend acted suitably impressed. Of course, Aladdin also thought it was a cheap ring, but he didn't want to hurt his friend's feelings.

In truth, the ring was very valuable, and would grant up to three wishes. There were some limitations, of course. The wishes weren't as powerful as those the Genie of the Lamp could grant. It couldn't make you wealthy beyond belief, but it could arrange for you to fortuitously find a small bag of silver coins. It couldn't make you Helen of Troy, but it could give you her hair and figure for a couple of days.

The ring also only had three wishes. Not three wishes per person Just three wishes in the ring. And they could only be activated by someone who was a "diamond in the rough."

Sound familiar?

The unfortunate thing for Aladdin was that he was unaware that he had three wishes, or that the three wishes were being granted.

The first wish was granted when he, Abu and Jasmine were making their escape from the city guards. Not only did they escape the guards, the wish would make sure that none of the three could be found in the next two days. Not even the city guards acting under Jafar's direction and guidance could find Aladdin for the next two days.

The next wish was granted when Abu was obviously resentful of Jasmine's presence. Aladdin was wishing that Abu would give him a little alone time with Jasmine.

And so Abu would keep himself busy for the next two days, giving Aladdin plenty of alone time with Jasmine.

And finally, while Aladdin wondered what life was like in the palace, and relating all the fanciful tales he had heard to Jasmine about it (not knowing she knew all about palace life), such as miniature people. Aladdin idly wondered what his new female friend would look like miniaturized.

And with that last wish made, Jasmine would find herself shrunk to six inches in height for the next two days,

The good news was, that the way Aladdin's wish to get a better grip on the situation was granted wouldn't count against his two remaining wishes. And the wish itself would only last a few days, perhaps even hours, before reversing itself.

The wedding ceremony was over and, as the guests below continued to celebrate, Aladdin carried Jasmine up to the wedding chamber, to finally consummate their love for each other.

Both bride and groom were excited, but Jasmine was very, very nervous. Unlike Aladdin (who more than one attractive female denizen of the city, both highborn and lowborn, had found "very tasty"). Jasmine was coming into the marriage a virgin. Yes, she has kissed Aladdin several times, embraced him, and enjoyed the feeling of his bare chest pressed against her scantily clad one. But Jasmine has resisted doing anything more than that, and Aladdin has respected her wishes.

Now it was their wedding night, and all her fantasies were about to come true.

But Jasmine's life has been a sheltered one, so her fantasies about what was going to happen were more than a little fuzzy.

Thus her trepidation.

Enter the Genie's gift. He had returned for the wedding, and at the reception afterwards, had given Aladdin a magic jewel. The magic jewel could be used only once, and would last only two days. It could only be used by Aladdin, and it would only work on Jasmine, and it had to be used within three days of the wedding.

But what it would do was shrink Jasmine down to six inches. And just Jasmine. Not her clothes, either. Just her body.

Aladdin was rather dubious about the present, but Genie assured him that both Aladdin and Jasmine would enjoy the gift.

Aladdin could see how nervous his bride was about their wedding night, So as he sat her down on the wedding bed, he decided to

11522.content:
It was not a good day to defy the Sultan.

Normally, the Sultan was a kind and gentle soul, one who loved his daughter and the people of his Sultanate. He tended to be a doter, and his Vizier Jafar found it easy to manipulate the old man, using a combination of flattery, doubletalk and mesmerizing magic.

But as the saying goes, you can play the same hand once too often.

The Sultan had been uneasy recently. Jafar did his best to isolate the Sultan, trying to ensure that any and all information coming to the Sultan came only through the Vizier. However, word still got to the Sultan about how Jafar was using the city guard to "crack down" on the denizens of the city.

This all culminated with Jafar overstepping his authority by ordering the death of a young street urchin. The Vizier had much authority, and the Sultan had given him more (or rather Jafar had weaseled more authority out of the Sultan) over the years, but the decisions of life and death still resided with the Sultan. The Sultan would never relinquish that particular authority, so terrible a power he considered it.

Adding to the Sultan's worries was his daughter's refusal to accept any of the proposals of the visiting princes. The Sultan knew he wasn't getting any younger, and he worried about his daughter's future welfare.

Then there was the business of Jasmine getting past the palace guards and slipping into the city. She might have considered that a grand lark, but the Sultan thought it foolish and dangerous.

So perhaps what happened next was inevitable.

Jafar was using his staff to mesmerize the Sultan, as he had done countless times before. This time, Jafar was using it to convince the Sultan to force Jasmine to marry him.

But the normally affable Sultan had a lot on his mind. So he wasn't so easily mesmerized. Point of fact, he snapped out of the mesmerization process at a point where he saw the eyes of the staff glowing. The Sultan was not always the swiftest horse in the race, but he suddenly recognized what Jafar was trying to do. The Sultan also suddenly realized what Jafar had been doing to him all these years.

The Sultan called the palace guards immediately, and Jafar (and for good measures, his parrot Iago) were both summarily executed.

Nobody in the palace missed Jafar, but it did make everyone sit up and be a little more respectful to the Sultan.

With the musical arrival of Prince Ali Ababwa, the Sultan was put in a much better mood. Being able to ride the flying carpet seemed to return the Sultan of old.

But then Jasmine rejected the Prince Ali out of hand, just as she had all the others.

And that was all her father could stand.

So he issued an official decree. Henceforth, the princess could go anywhere she wanted. She just couldn't wear clothes. Not until she was married.

Jasmine pleaded, begged and threatened, but to no avail. Her father informed her that she could either surrender her clothes to her female attendants, or he would order the palace guards to forcefully remove them.

The guards looked more than eager to carry out those orders.

With a huff, Jasmine retreated to her quarters, where only her female attendants were allowed. A few minutes later, one of those attendants delivered all the clothing Jasmine had been wearing to the Sultan.

The Sultan had just effectively confined Jasmine to her quarters and the rooftop garden until such time as she found a husband. Worse (in Jasmine's eyes at least), she would be forced to entertain a prospective husband with only her hands, arms and carefully positioned stances to protect her modesty.

(So what happens next?)

1311.content:
How much would have changed if Voldemort had never been. What if Tom Riddle had never gotten an invitation to Hogwarts? Would he have lived his life bitter and disgruntled, with strange things happening around him, but never have been a threat to anyone? Would he have gotten an education somehow?

Maybe someone else would have become 'a Voldemort' anyway. Someone powerful who believed that pureblood wizards and witches should naturally rule over muggles.

Or maybe with no Voldemort, things would have gone more peacefully, but there would still be some trouble. Just not on the scale we saw in the original series.

Perhaps if Hagrid was able to remain in Hogwarts and graduate, other half-giants and other half-breeds would have made it into Hogwarts.

Maybe James and Lily Potter would have had more children. Maybe Sirius Black would have found true love and had children of his own. Lots of options to explore in the no Voldemort universe!
1311.title: No Tom Riddle, No Voldemort

13113.content:
The successful graduation of Rubeus Hagrid from Hogwarts opened up new doors for other "half breeds" (if you will forgive the odious slur). Individuals who might have been reluctant to mingle with wizards and witches felt more comfortable, especially with Dumbledore as head of the school. Yes, there was some push back, but if was marginalized, and not accepted by mainstream wizardry.

So it was that a very TALL and langley Logan Vass reported to Hogwarts the same year that Harry Potter, Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger showed up at school, Of course, Harry didn't have a scar nor notoriety, since he who must not be named was now he who never was.

Harry and Hermione became friends when Harry and his parents encountered Hermione and her parents at Diagon Alley. Ron fell into the crowd when he and Draco Malfoy butted heads, and Harry took Ron's side.

Perhaps some friendships are always destined to be.

Logan had been sorted into Ravenclaw, and he was quite happy with that. He was the studious sort, and able to make rapid leaps of logic. Logan got along very well with his housemates, and was friendly enough with other houses. He had light brown hair, green eyes, lightly tanned skin, and the girls in his year took to calling him Supersized Cedric, after Cedric Diggory, who had been a couple of years ahead of Logan.

When the TriWizard Tournament was held, and there was a Yule Ball, Logan stayed back at Ravenclaw House. His reasoning was simple. He was almost twice as tall as anyone he could have asked to the Ball,

(By his final year, Logan was a few inches shy of being eleven feet tall).

Any potential date Logan could have had, when dancing with him, would find the top of their heads aligning with Logan's waist. Which meant their faces would have been face to face with Logan's private parts. Worse, Logan was a teenage boy, who got excited in the presence of teenage girls, and his excitement would have been visibly obvious to any potential date.

So Logan bowed out of the Yule Ball and any other occasion where he might be expected to dance.

This changed in Logan's seventh year at Hogwarts, when he began dating
13113.title: Another Half Giant

131134.content:
In the Voldemort free Universe, it wasn't until her fourth year that Hermione's circle of friends really began expanding.

She had her housemates, certainly, and thanks to the early encounter between her parents and Harry's, she wasn't quite the obnoxious know-it-all that she had been in the Voldemort Universe. And serving as a mentor of sorts to Harry's little sister when the latter began Hogwarts two years later helped mellow Hermione out.

But it was in her fourth year, when Hogwarts hosted the TriWizard Tournament, that Hermione began to come out.

In the Voldemort free Universe, there were only three participants in the Tournament, and it would be Cedric Diggory who would win it free and clear. Harry was already enjoying a certain amount of fame as one of the best Seekers the Gryffindors had ever seen. And, along with Ron and two other male Gryffindors, Harry had revived his father's Marauders. Hermione was enjoying academic success at the School, and could always be counted on to earn points for her house in the classroom. And she had plenty of people she was friends with in Hogwarts. But in this universe, she wasn't as close to Ron or Harry or anyone as she had been in the Voldemort universe.

That changed when Viktor Krum asked her to accompany him to the Yule Ball. Hermione suddenly found herself in the midst of other young women of Gryffindor preparing themselves for the ball. And she found herself making new friends, talking about the most profound and silliest things and, for the first time in four years, not worrying in the least about mastering this wand technique or that potion combination.

In Hermione's fifth year, she decided to take the advice offered by Angelina Johnson and take a fairly rare potion. The potion only affected young women going through the latter stages of adolescence, and its effects were gradual, not immediate. Hermione was becoming a lovely young woman, but the potion helped her become just a little bit more so. By her seventh year, Hermione was sporting a full C-Cup, as compared to the modest B-Cup she had in the Voldemort universe. And though still narrow, her hips weren't quite as narrow as they were in the Voldemort universe.

Hermione dated a bit more, but never seriously. She had never let a boy do more than kiss her. Not even Viktor. Though her dates never fit a "type," Hermione secretly preferred physical men. Like Viktor.

And especially like Logan.

Logan would have been handsome, even hot, if he had been human sized. Standing at almost eleven foot, Logan was literally larger than life. In addition, he was the archetypal Ravenclaw, and not even Professor Snape had any problems with Logan in his classroom.

Logan's only problem was that he didn't date. It seemed he had a problem dating women half his size. Ironically, many of the young woman at Hogwarts would date Logan despite his size. And one or two would date him for his height.

Including Hermione.

Logan's best friend at Hogwarts was his fellow Ravenclaw, Luna Lovegood. Though there was never any romantic inclinations between the two, their "outsider" perspective drew them together in friendship.

It was Luna who convinced Logan to ask Hermione to the Harvest Gala in his seventh year. Hermione happily accepted.

This led to the practical problem of how Hermione and Logan were to dance. Luna provided the practical solution that Logan would carry Hermione in right hand for slow dances, while the couple would sit out and talk for the fast dances.

Logan for one enjoyed having Hermione sit her cute little bum in his right hand as they danced. And Hermione enjoyed having Logan's large, strong right hand on her bum every time they danced.

Despite their first date together, Logan and Hermione's was a chaste romance, limited to holding hands and sharing quick kisses. This was about to change when the pair went home for the winter holiday.

Both Logan and Hermione were going to spend the winter holiday separately with their respective family. However, before they went home, they were going to spend a three day weekend together, just the two of them, in
131134.title: Hermione Granger

13114.content:
Harry knew nothing of the alternative reality with Tom Riddle, of the sacrifice of Regulus Arcturus Black. He knew nothing of his self-sacrifice and the quest with a time-turner. The events ensuring he would die, taking the young Tom Riddle with him. They were lost to the wizarding world without making a ripple on their original reality.

Just a tragic accident, with a boy who liked to play with fire getting out of control. Sirius grew up without knowing a younger brother, and the time-stream rippled, burped and flowed on. He'd taken it as a challenge, knowing the impossibility of surviving, and with the limited prospect of success. However, he fell as a quiet hero, without fanfare or recognition of his sacrifice. He passed from knowledge, without reward.

- - - - -

Harry squeezed Dilly's hand a reassuring gesture, as they faced the blank pillar in Kings' Cross. Their parents standing back, Lily and James looking on, beaming with pride. James driving the railway trolley, with the owl, and the large trunk to carry all his books, and the 'unknown' contraband his father absolutely hadn't discovered.

"Hello James." It was a gruff voice, Harry whirled excitedly on hearing it.

"Sirius." he cried out, letting Dilly's hand fall away. He leapt into the bearhug embrace of his favourite uncle. The more reserved, and scruffier Uncle Lupin was smiling indulgently, patiently waiting for his hug. Between, and behind them Uncle Peter shifted nervously. He didn't seem comfortable in large crowds, always scurrying from place to place.

From his hug, he gave his other uncles a congenial smile.

With a pat on the shoulders, the hug was broken.

"You'll go to Hogwarts, soon too." James assured Dilly.

Dilly was named to honour Lily's sisters child. A sad story, given how little the sisters spoke, and how poorly they got on. She'd lost her son, and Lily with two children was accused of flaunting them. She couldn't even offer sympathy without being accused of rubbing in her sister's misfortune.

With a shared silent look, they gestured for Harry to lead them onto the platform. With glee he charged towards the pillar, dragging Dilly behind, just slightly reluctantly.

143.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider

1431.content:
(Based on the 2013 Tomb Raider)

Lara follows the long trail up to what looks to be a small tomb opening. She pulls out a knife from her boot and cuts down the surrounding branches and bushes. Lara smiles as she sees a small concrete pillar blocking the door with a small symbol on it. She smirks and pulls out her map, the map has an identical logo on it what in the shape of a small eagle. It had only taken her a couple of days but she had finally found it.

Lara reaches out wiping some dust around the logo to reveal a few smaller logos and patters, she hums and looks back down at the map seeing the same patterns on her map. She glances up at the pillar then back down at the map.

“I wonder.” Lara whispers.

She reaches out and presses the four logo pattens in the order it shows up on her map, lion, bear, snake, wolf and finally eagle. All five symbols light up glowing bight and the pillar starts to rumble. Lara takes a step back, the pillar shifts backwards and slides into the wall revealing a staircase leading into darkness.

“You’ve done it again Lara.” She smirks to herself.

Lara picks up a stick that she had cut off and wraps a bit of fabric around the end of it. She pulls out her lighter and sets the end on fire creating herself a torch and ventures into the cave.

Lara has been meaning to search this island for a while now, she’s had the island on her radar for a long time but she never got around to it. Every time Lara was about to dedicate her time to this island something else came up that needed her attention more, after about five years of distractions she has finally made it. She’s at the tomb ready to discover what is inside.

The island Lara is on is nothing too mysterious, while it was easily located on a map it spends most of its time deserted and unpopulated. Lara is interested in what lies within the island, there is nothing documented about what lays there as it all is surrounded in mystery. All that’s been documented is that there is a treasure that lies within a hidden tomb on the island. No one knows what is inside or what could happen as on one has discovered it yet.

Lara has spent the past couple of days decoding some messages and clues for the tomb, she figured the inside the tomb wont be as easy as she thinks. She knew that there was the passcode but had found hints and clues towards keys to unlock what lies inside. Though out the island Lara found a total of four keys.

“First door.” She sighs.

Lara reaches into her pocket and pulls out one of the three keys with little icons on the end of them, Lara looks up and sees that this door has a little skull on it. Lara smirks and inserts the skull key into the key hole. She turns it and hears a click, the door squeaks extremely loudly and swings open.

“I can tell that no one has been here in a long time.” Lara says walking though. “That door needs a bit of oil.”

Lara ventures into the cave more, she expects to be stopped by some traps or something but to her surprise nothing has attacked her. She steps on what feels like a pleasure plate and hears a loud creak and click causing her heart to sink. Nothing happens. She holds her torch to the wall next to her only to find a broken and rusted contraption. She takes a further look to find that a spear was supposed to come out and stab her but because it hasn’t been in use its now rusted over and stuck.

“That was close.” Lara sighs.

Lara wanders down the long corridor for what feels like a solid ten minutes and nothing has happened, no traps set off, no doors, nothing. Lara sighs but continue to venture forward, while she does feel that there may not be anything at the end she wants to see for herself and not give up on a hunch.

Lara arrives at the end only to find a small little treasure chest sitting on a solid concrete pillar. Lara hums to herself, she looks around trying to find some sort of trap around it as she knows this can’t be that easy. She looks around only to find that the pillar rests on a rusty pressure plate that looks to set off some sort of trap. Lara smirks, if this was set to be like the last trap she should be fine.

“Found the last matches.” Lara smirks seeing the two key holes on the chest.

She inserts both keys into the slot and turns them until she hears a click. Lara smiles widely as the lid of the chest slowly opens. What could the secret be that is hiding within, what mystery has been hidden for thousands of years only to be discovered now?

“A fucking necklace.” Lara sighs.

She looks at it with disappointment, she had spent a couple of years trying to find clues and whatever she can to find the great mysterious treasure only to discover its a necklace. It is a decent looking one but nothing too special, its gold with a little diamond in the centre.

Lara reaches in and takes it out with ease. She hears a little creak coming from the pillar but doesn’t think too much of it. She grips the necklace as she turns around only to find that the whole tomb is starting to shake.

“Shit.” Lara gasps.

A few rocks start to fall and Lara runs down the long corridor dodging rocks and stones as they fall. Lara feels the necklace slowly slip out of her hand so she puts it over her head for safe keeping. Lara yelps as she feels the necklace shrink a little tightening around her neck. She tries to get it off regretting what she has done but it doesn’t budge. Her body jolts but Lara keeps running trying to avoid the falling stones.

“Please no.” Lara begs seeing the exit in the distance slowly being covered by rocks.

Lara gets close and jumps diving though a small opening at the door. She lands on the ground with a hard thud and knocks herself out cold.


1. Lara wakes up later feeling completely fine
2. Lara wakes up only to find that she is in a different location
3. Lara wakes up only to find some drastic changes to her body
4. Lara wakes up and finds she is now a giant

14325.content:
Until a day ago, Laura had never heard of the Recusata Ring.

Laura had just come back from an expedition in Egypt and was planning on doing nothing but relaxing for the next fortnight. Mind you, Laura's idea of relaxation usually involved gunfire and acrobatics, but it was still relaxation. And it definitely did not involve tomb raiding.

Laura was taking her tea on the deck of a schooner in the local marina, going through the mail that had accumulated in her absence.

Among the mail was a package with no return address.

Inside the package was a notebook with the words "Recusata Ring" hand stenciled on the cover. Her curiosity piqued, Lara started flipping through the pages of handwritten notes.

The pages were filled with different handwritings and different colors of ink.

According to one of the authors of this notebook, this Recusata Ring started its existence as a ring for King Solomon, and was the home of a djinn or an efreet, depending on which legend you believed. One author in the book suggested the ring was somehow connected to the Sibylline Books, while another thought the ring was in the legendary Soria Moria castle during that time period.

Laura's tea went cold as she delved into the various and often contradictory tales of the Recusata Ring contained in the notebook.

The notebook itself was about two thirds filled, with the other third of the pages blank. When Lara flipped through the empty pages, a small slip of paper fell out of the notebook, with the following letters written on it:
14325.title: The Recusata Ring

Jeri and I ended up being seated next to each other on the flight. Small world. No pun intended," Carrie added with a wan smile.

"We paid the cab driver extra to get us her as fast as possible," Jeri added. "I'm thinking we should have saved our money and shown up even later than we did." This got a laugh from everyone in the bag.

"Maybe not," Halle countered. "The guy who picked us up...well, you already know how relaxed we are around him. He's not going to hurt us. But do you think you would have wanted to be in this condition and have the cab driver who brought you from the airport get a hold of you?"

Jeri and Carrie shuddered and shook their heads vehemently.

The year was 2009, and there was an auction going on that didn't involve Taylor Swift. Well, not yet, but it soon would.

Daniel Thompson was just your typical eighteen year old boy genius who had soulful brown eyes and sandy blonde hair that just invited female friends to run their fingers through it. It was a fact that Daniel wouldn't have minded if one of the women who wanted to do that with his hair had wanted to become something more than friends. Daniel wouldn't have minded if at least one of those women wanted to be friends with benefits.

But all the women Daniel knew that he wanted to be more than just friends kept him safely in the celibate friend zone.

Frustrated, Daniel retreated to the internet.

Now, before we go further, it should be note that Daniel wasn't a bad looking guy. He was a little on the skinny side, but he ran five miles a day to think (and incidentally keep in shape) and he was really a very nice guy who wouldn't hurt anyone. He was the sort of guy who nursed small wild animals back to health and helped little old ladies cross the road.

Yes, Daniel was a nice guy, but he was still a guy, and he still had desires. So Daniel turned to the internet to help alleviate those desires.

During that time Daniel developed a fetish for shrunken women. His tastes were pretty vanilla. He had no desire to digest a shrunken woman, torture a shrunken woman, or insert a shrunken woman into any part of his anatomy. His fantasies consisted of gentle caresses, licks and rubs. Daniel even fantasized about restoring the shrunken woman to her normal height afterwards, with a lifetime of alternating between her being full-sized and shrunken.

Daniel even had a small collection of items that he kept private that involved his fetish. One of these was a "shrinking potion" that he had bought at an online auction for five hundred dollars. It was a midnight blue liquid in an ornate and sealed flask. The instructions said that just a few drops ingested by a young woman in good health would shrink her down to the height of six inches.

The instructions also said the young woman would not shrink instantly, but would feel compelled to travel to the owner of the potion when he was alone. The young woman in question would present herself to him, at which point she would shrink out of her clothes.

Remember the part about Daniel being a boy genius? Well, Daniel had developed a number of devices and programs, including a digital anti-piracy program that earned him quite a bit of money and appreciation with the recording industry.

And because of his background, Daniel knew that there were no such thing as shrinking potions. particularly ones that did what this one claimed to do. All the liquid did was help fuel some of Daniel's fantasies. Nothing more.

2009 was also an important year, in that Taylor Swift and Kellie Pickler recorded a duet entitled "Best Years of Your Life" that made it to number nine on the country charts. To commemorate this, an event was held to which Daniel was invited.

What kind of event was it?

It was a party where celebrities would pose in pictures with other celebrities, pretending to be besties, then move on and smooze with the various executives there.

Twenty-year old Taylor Swift and twenty-three year old Kellie Pickler's recent success was being celebrated, but there were others there being celebrated as well. Twenty-five year old Katy Perry was present to celebrate the success of her single "Hot and Cold." Twenty-nine year old Jessica Simpson was there with her holiday album soon to be released. So Daniel was there in a brand new suit, feeling very out of a place, and with that same midnight blue potion in his pocket. Not because he thought it would work. But because if he somehow managed to get one of the beautiful women to drink a few drops, he could use that event as the basis for a fantasy later that night.

Normally, these sort of events don't have a punch bowl. Drinks are carried out by waitstaff and plucked off the tray by attendees as the servers go by. Or attendees go to the fully stocked bar and order their drinks

In this case, in addition to waiters and a bar, there was a punch bowl in the center of the room. The punch bowl was part of an ice sculpture, with drinks being continuously dipped by the serving staff and placed in a pyramidal structure. So no one was actually dipping a ladle into the punch to serve themselves. That sort of thing only happened in movies about high school proms.

Daniel had already turned off some of the attendees with his technobabble, and the waitstaff had quickly learned to keep their engagements with him brief, as Daniel had continuous questions about the pumping and circulatory system used as part of the ice sculpture/punchbowl centerpiece.

So most people were pointedly not paying attention to Daniel when he poured the potion into the punchbowl.

As luck would have it, the potion had circulated enough in the punch so as to be undetectable, but with a high enough concentration that it would affect anyone who would be susceptible to its effects.

Daniel stood in a dark corner watching various people walk by the centerpiece without really giving it a glance. Then his heart leaped when he saw not one but five beautiful women approach the centerpiece. And they actually picked up glasses to drink the punch!

For perhaps the first time in recording history, you had a group of five young women singers (Taylor, Kellie, Katy, Renee and Jessica) gathered together, none of whom had a feud going with any of the others.

As the five talked about something or other around the bowl, Daniel watched intensely as the five singers sipped out of their cups. Well, four actually. Taylor had lifted the glass to her lips. But before Taylor could sip her punch, Daniel heard Kellie say something about "pineapple juice," at which point Taylor set her cup down.

Daniel was disappointed when Taylor set her glass down. Not that he was actually expecting the shrinking potion to work. But watching Taylor drink the punch along with the other women would have fired some powerful fantasies.

Daniel consoled himself that he had still seen the other four singers drink their punch. Perhaps that would be better in the long room, Daniel consoled himself. He had a penchant for large breasted shrunken women anyway.

In 2014, two international singing sensations, Katy Perry and Taylor Swift, simply disappeared. Since they were on two different continents at the time, their disappearances were investigated by two different groups of law enforcement agencies and security consultants. In both cases, there was no signs of how the two women were kidnapped, nor any clues of what had happened to them after they disappeared. But there was no assumption of any connection between the two disappearances

Of course, there was a connection between the two. Just none that anyone who didn't have arcane training could see.

As most people who keep up with the news know, there is a market for almost anything you could want, and someone who will provide it, if you know who to talk to and can pay their price.

In this case, there was a market for young female celebrities who had been shrunken down to (approximately) six inches.

The price for acquiring such valued objects is high, and there are a lot of restrictions as well. Most of this has to do with the fact that the natural laws that govern the modern world don't allow for the shrinking of a live human being. For that, you have to rely on someone who can manipulate the world around them using magic.

The widespread use of magic has diminished since the sinking of Atlantis, and has all but disappeared in the modern world. The last true sorcerer in the world was Merlin, and his time ended more than a thousand years ago. The few magicians left in the world who can perform feats such as shrinking a person would barely be considered apprentices during the reign of Atlantis.

Case in point, the sorcerer who orchestrated the kidnapping and shrinking of Taylor and Katy. In order to accomplish this task, he first had to arrange certain arcane symbols and movements to be put in Katy's Dark Horse video, to draw on the adoration of her fans. Then he had to arrange a public feud between the two singers, to draw from that negative energy. This was accomplished by getting a handful of dancers to leave one tour for the other.

And even after the singers were shrunken, the magician had to find just the right buyer. The buyer in questions would have to be the gentle sort. who wouldn't try to insert either of the singer into places they shouldn't go, or want to cause them pain. Actions like that could cause arcane repercussions that no one would want to consider. But finding a person like that in the dark corners of the real and virtual world where two tiny singers would be auctioned off would be almost impossible to find.

Fortunately, for the magician, magic has other uses than just shrinking down unsuspecting young singers. The magician who shrank Katy and Taylor found an eighteen year old male tech inventor who was just the gentle sort that could pay a hundred million dollars for the shrunken pair of singers and, more importantly, keep his mouth shut and not do the sort of ungentle things that would cancel the spell.

So our story begins with David Wilkins, an eighteen year old inventor with blue eyes and sandy blonde hair, who is a little skinny but not a bad looking kid. My name is Arnold Cover. I'm 44 years old. I work as an accountant at a very large firm. I am very tall and in really good shape, although I do have a lot of hair on my body. Most say I look like I'm in my early thirties even though I'm 44.

I think that I'm in really good shape because I watch my diet and go to the gym regularly.

Life isn't super exciting for me. My wife, Megan, passed away only a couple months ago. Which left things really sad and awkward for me and my now 15 year old daughter, Carly.

Carly is just like her mother, long brown hair, wears really cute glasses, relatively short in stature and very pretty overrall. Surprisingly I haven't had to deal with a whole lot of boys chasing after her, which I found strange considering how beautiful and smart she was.

I couldn't be prouder to have her as my daughter.

In the same way, I surprisingly didn't meet any women after my wife passed. There were honestly no women that came that close for me. So I decided that if the right women fell into my lap then I would proceed but until then I would just raise my daughter as a single man.

I felt bad that Carly and I didn't talk as much as we used to. It was like there was a great distance between me and my daughter. Sometimes I wish that things were more simple, and that it was easier to communicate with her.

All of that changed when my daughter shrunk down to five inches tall.

Where did he discover her shrunk?

15 year old Brooklin was a little more rebellious than her sister. She was a straight C student, and often talked back to her mom but despite her attitude, her mom thought she was still her precious daughter. She had long dark brown hair, with a thick butt that went well with her slim figure.

Finally there was 12 year old Lily. Lily was the youngest and quietest of the trio. She had long blonde hair and blue eyes like her oldest sister. She rarely hung out with anyone and mostly only read books and played with her dolls. Her mother loved her dearly and wished she could get her to come out of her shell.

Ellen's three beautiful daughters were the only thing keeping her happy in her life and she just wished that she could be closer to them in all of the ways that were humanly possible but with her job and the fact that all had their lives and different personalities it was going to be so difficult. That was until one day, Ellen was searching online about trying to get quality time with her daughters when she discovered an option that excited her imagination.

SHRINKING

"Oh my gosh," Ellen thought, "Is that really possible? Could I shrink my three girls?" She did her research and found that shrinking was very possible and used for various means. There were even several options in which shrinking could work.

So Ellen got online and bought the tool of choice that she would use to shrink her daughters.

This caused Brooklin to loose some height and her kick to lose power. The ball hit the net and began rolling back towards her as she grew smaller. She soon realized that the ball would squash her flat and started to run.. It was then that her mother, appeared, stopping the ball with her foot and scooping her tiny daughter up in her hand.

"Don't worry, darling. mommy is here to rescue you." Brooklin was rather frightened of her now gigantic mother. She actually began screaming in horror, but Ellen just laughed and walked with her into the house. She sat her tiny middle daughter on the bed and smiled sweetly. It was horrifying to Brooklin's viewpoint.

Ellen found something that would be absolutely perfect for shrinking her three girls. A shrinking potion at only 300 dollars. A drop of potion introduced to any drink will cause the subject to shrink down to five inches in height.

Each drop will keep the subject shrunk for 24 hours.

Ellen giddy with delight at the thought of making her beautiful daughters the size of dolls filled with heart with glee.

With a quick press of a button, the doting mother purchased her shrinking potion.

THE NEXT MORNING

Ellen opened her package and found what looked like a small jelly jar filled with a purple liquid.

"This must be it! The time for shrinking is upon us." She squealed with delight as she prepared breakfast and drinks for her daughters. She had green tea for Mackenzie, coffee for Brooklin, and an orange juice for Lily.

She started to put drops into her daughters' cups and then she remembered how one drop equals 24 hours. So she thought long and hard and dropped 35 drops of potion into each cup. Ensuring that her precious ones would be tiny for up to five weeks, giving her more time to have fun with them.

"Girls! Breakfast is ready!" Ellen called

The three girls all ready for school came down in their usual way.

Ellen greeted each of her daughters with a kiss on the cheek. Mackenzie reacted casually, Brooklin reacted annoyed wiping the kiss from her cheek, and Lily awkwardly smiled.

Each of the girls drank every drop of their drinks and enjoyed their pancake breakfast, except Brooklin.

"Mom, can you make something other than pancakes please, I'm sick of having them every morning."

"Oh Brooklin, no need to be grouchy." Ellen said with a smile.

"Thanks for breakfast Mom," Mackenzie said, "But we gotta get going to school."

"Oh you don't have to worry about that, I called you three in today." Ellen said.

"Huh?" Lily wondered.

"Why did you call us in?" Brooklin asked?

"Well, I just wanted to spend the day with you three, that's all. I wanted to enjoy this gorgeous day with my three favorite girls in the whole world."

"Mom?" Mackenzie said. "I'm starting to feel funny."

"Me too, my stomach is rumbling" Lily responded.

"Ugh, Mom, what did you put in those pancakes?"

"Oh, don't you three worry about it, Mommy's taken care of everything for her three special girls just you wait."

The three girls clutched their stomachs and felt everything getting lighter.

154312222.content:
A DOLL'S DOLL

After she almost sells her childhood doll to a garage sale, 13 year old Megan finds herself six inches tall with her doll now as a full sized adult woman.

The roles are reversed as Megan is now the toy for her childhood doll, and the life size beauty has some fun plans in store for her former owner.
154312222.title: Another SW Scenario

choices: In a pile of her clothes on her bed
1543122221.content:
When Megan Barbella was a child, she didn't play with many toys except for one. This was her special doll, a classic edition, Blonde hair, blue eyed Lisa Lovely Doll. Very much like a barbie doll except the proportions weren't quite as ridiculous.

Megan was very shy as a child and would often play with Lisa Lovely on her own, seeing her as one of her only friends until one day she decided she wanted to become more popular, so she put away her doll and started to become much more of a beauty queen with an attitude. Dressing in nicer clothes, becoming more full of herself, and now at thirteen years of age, she had achieved a comfortable level of popularity.

Megan had curly brown hair, and a dark complexion. Many people remarked that she looked very similar to Zendaya, but in her mind, she was better than Zendaya.

One night Megan was talking on the phone with her friend, Brittany, her mom interrupted her.

"Megan! Make sure you gather up anything you don't want for the garage sale tomorrow!"

"Ugh, fine mom!" Megan said. "I gotta go Britt, Mom's making me do stupid things."

Megan went to fill up a box with old clothes and knick knacks and then she found her old Lisa Lovely doll. She looked at the blonde doll for a quick second before realizing that she was too old.

"Eh, you can go. I don't need you anymore." After Megan put the barbie sized doll in the box, she got in her pajamas and went to bed. Little did Megan know, but her doll was going to change severely and so was she...

The next morning, Megan woke up...
1543122221.title: A Doll's Doll

15431222213.content:
Megan slowly woke up, she had a massive head ache and could barely remember the light before.

"Ugh, what happened?" Soon, Megan felt herself on a soft pale surface, almost flesh like. "What the hell is this?" Megan rubbed her eyes, and looked up at something that was casting a massive shadow over her.

It was the face of a gorgeous blue eyed blonde woman in her early thirties, she looked almost like Margot Robbie. She had a killer body with a perfect figure with boobs and ass. She wore a long blue dress and had bright red lipstick.

"Hello Megan, glad to see you woke up?"

"Who... who are you? And why am I small?" Megan said scared.

"Oh you poor thing, I guess we simply traded fates. I became a human and meanwhile all of my smallness was transferred to you."

Megan put everything together.

"Lisa? Is that you?"

"Bingo, Megan. How clever." She booped Megan on her tiny nose. "Lisa Lovely is now Life Size, isn't it great. I look so much hotter in a human body than I do as a plastic little bimbo." Lisa admired her shapely figure in a mirror.

"Hello!!" Megan said from Lisa's palm. "Lisa, you have to help me! You gotta make me big again."

Lisa closed her fist around the five inch tall thirteen year old.

"Listen shrimp, I don't gotta do anything. You were going to give me away like I was nothing. You were gonna forget about me. Well now I get to call the shots, and you my little light brown cutie, get to be my doll. How about that, teeny?"

Megan was horrified her childhood doll was now human sized while she was no bigger than a five inch doll. What does Lisa say to Megan next?
15431222213.title: In the hands of a former doll

154312222131.content:
"You know what Megan, I think that we should spend some more quality time together. Oh! I know, let's go shopping!"

Megan was floored. "I don't wanna go shopping I wanna be big again!"

"Oh quit your whining, it'll be fun. You're not gonna be big for a while so you might as well have fun with me."

Megan pouted as she was enclosed in Lisa's hand.

"Awww, how cute?" Lisa said. Lisa gently patted Megan's head. "Don't worry, hon, we're gonna have a blast. Now I just gotta put you somewhere."

"You're not taking me anywhere, you're going to go downstairs and find my mom, and fix this."

"Megan sweetie, I told you I don't know how to fix this, so please just let your old doll have some fun." Lisa lightly booped Megan on her nose. "Ah here we go!"

Lisa looked down and found Megan's purse.

"Cute purse."

"You can't use that! That's mine."

Lisa smiled. "It's mine now, Megan, don't worry I'll keep you safe." With that Lisa unzipped the purse and dropped Megan inside.

"Sit tight, babe." Lisa said with a wink before zipping up the purse.

"You let me out of here you giant bitch!" The thirteen year old girl pouted wondering how she was gonna get out of this situation."

After avoiding the eyes of Megan's mother and brothers, Lisa took a cab to the mall.

Once she stepped inside of the "Oaks Corner Mall", she pulled out Megan from the purse.

"See? That wasn't so bad, was it?"

"I'm not talking to you," Megan said pissed off.

"Aww come on, Megan, don't be like that. We've got shopping to do."

Where do Lisa and Megan go first?
154312222131.title: We're going shopping!

Create a new story in fictional worlds. Movies, TV Shows, Books, Video-games. Straight up fictional, a shrinking story, transformation story, crossovers, romantic you name it. Anything goes.

Rules:
1. No ending stories
2. Be respectful towards others stories if they have written a long story with many chapters
3. Put effort into each chapter, do not make endless option chapters, I will delete
4. No children to in romantic or sexual situations (13 is the youngest age)
5. Put some effort into chapters chapters please, if there are too many couple word chapters that lead to nothing they will be delated
6. Have fun

Break any rules I'll delete your chapters. Any problems or questions send me a email.
